overview: What is your dream? How do you imagine yourself 10 years from now? Being a trans in Brazil is an act of daily resistance, being alive and allowing yourself to dream is necessary. In a futuristic wilderness a bunch of transvestites create their own redoubt. From clay they create their corps-territories, evoke their ancestralities from the force of fire, celebrate their existences, and dream.
title: Lamento de Força Travesti
